item.title: Two papers awarded the Outstanding Paper Award from KCC 2024
item.description: Two papers from CSArch was awarded the Outstanding Paper Award from the Korea Computer Congress (KCC) 2024. Big congrats, Yewon and Jiwon!

item.title: Warped-MC awarded the Best Paper Award from ICPP 2023
item.description: Our paper entitled “Warped-MC: An Efficient Memory Controller Scheme for Massively Parallel Processors” was awarded the Best Paper Award from the 52nd International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP). Big congrats Jonghyun!!

item.title: Jongmin received the Excellent Research Paper Award from Korea University
item.description: Jongmin received the Excellet Research Paper Award from Korea University for the research paper entitled “CacheRewinder: Revoking Speculative Cache Updates Exploiting Write-Back Buffer” published in the proceedings of 2022 Design, Automation & Test in Europe Conference & Exhibition (DATE). Congrats Jongmin!
